bond_famulus.Name: Bond Famulus
bond_famulus.AdditionalNotes: Vampires may only have one famulus but you can make animal ghouls without this.

sense_the_beast.Name: Sense the Beast
sense_the_beast.AdditionalNotes: This power can also be used actively.

atavism.Name: Atavism
atavism.Duration: Number of rounds equal to margin +1 or entire scene if it's a Critical win
atavism.Effect: Revert animals to their base and primal instincts.
atavism.AdditionalNotes: The target must be able to sense the user for this power to work.

feral_whispers.Name: Feral Whispers
feral_whispers.Cost: One Rouse Check per type of animal
feral_whispers.Effect: Two-way communication with animals or summoning.
feral_whispers.AdditionalNotes: The cost is free if used on their Famulus.

animal_succulence.Name: Animal Succulence
animal_succulence.Effect: Slake additional hunger from animals and counts Blood Potency as 2 levels lower in regards to slaking penalties.
animal_succulence.AdditionalNotes: This will never let the character slake to 0.

quell_the_beast.Name: Quell the Beast
quell_the_beast.Effect: Force a vampire's beast to slumber or make a mortal lethargic.
quell_the_beast.AdditionalNotes: Against Vampires this lasts several turns equal to test margin +1.

scent_of_prey.Name: Scent of Prey
scent_of_prey.Effect: Track a mortal down who has witnessed a masquerade breach.
scent_of_prey.AdditionalNotes: It lasts one night if Critical Win.

unliving_hive.Name: Unliving Hive
unliving_hive.Effect: Extends Animalism influence to swarms of insects.
unliving_hive.AdditionalNotes: Swarms are treated as single creatures.

subsume_the_spirit.Name: Subsume the Spirit
subsume_the_spirit.Effect: Possess the body of an animal.
subsume_the_spirit.AdditionalNotes: The cost is free if used on their Famulus.

animal_dominion.Name: Animal Dominion
animal_dominion.Duration: One scene or when the directive is fulfilled
animal_dominion.Effect: Command flocks or packs of animals.
animal_dominion.AdditionalNotes: This power does not summon animals, instead utilizing those already present.

drawing_out_the_beast.Name: Drawing Out the Beast
drawing_out_the_beast.Effect: Transfer their terror or fury frenzy to a nearby victim.
drawing_out_the_beast.AdditionalNotes: This power cannot transfer Hunger Frenzy.

heightened_senses.Name: Heightened Senses
heightened_senses.Effect: Enhance vampiric senses and add Auspex rating to all perception rolls.
heightened_senses.AdditionalNotes: Having the power activated for long periods might require the use of Willpower.

sense_the_unseen.Name: Sense the Unseen
sense_the_unseen.AdditionalNotes: If the target is using Obfuscate they oppose using Wits + Obfuscate vs the user's Wits + Auspex, normal searches use Resolve.

obeah.Name: Obeah
obeah.AdditionalNotes: If the user uses this on more than one subject on the same night, the cost increases to spend Willpower equal to half the number of successes in the margin per additional target.

premonition.Name: Premonition
premonition.AdditionalNotes: The Storyteller may activate this power passively with no cost, when used actively the user must make a Rouse Check and roll Resolve + Auspex.

unerring_pursuit.Name: Unerring Pursuit
unerring_pursuit.Duration: One night plus one for each success
unerring_pursuit.AdditionalNotes: The victim can roll Wits + Awareness to catch a glimpse of the user once under its effects.

eyes_of_beasts.Name: Eyes of Beasts
eyes_of_beasts.AdditionalNotes: This power works through groups of animals.

scry_the_soul.Name: Scry the Soul
scry_the_soul.AdditionalNotes: This can either be used on a single target or a crowd.

share_the_senses.Name: Share the Senses
share_the_senses.AdditionalNotes: Sense the Unseen can allow the user to be noticed by the victim.

spirits_touch.Name: Spirit's Touch
spirits_touch.Effect: Gathering emotional residue from an object or location
spirits_touch.AdditionalNotes: What information they gleam works from the most recent backward.

clairvoyance.Name: Clairvoyance
clairvoyance.Duration: Few minutes up to one night
clairvoyance.AdditionalNotes: This power can be used to monitor events in progress.

possession.Name: Possession
possession.AdditionalNotes: This power does not give the ability to read the target's mind, use their skills or impersonate them.

telepathy.Name: Telepathy
telepathy.Cost: One Rouse (one Willpower on non-consenting vampires)
telepathy.Duration: One minute per rouse or full scene on consenting subject
telepathy.AdditionalNotes: The user doesn't need to roll to project their thoughts onto others.

unburdening_the_bestial_soul.Name: Unburdening the Bestial Soul
unburdening_the_bestial_soul.Effect: Stain removal or protection from Stains
unburdening_the_bestial_soul.AdditionalNotes: This power only works on vampires with a lower Humanity rating.

corrosive_vitae.Name: Corrosive Vitae
corrosive_vitae.AdditionalNotes: Does not work against unliving flesh, such as other vampires.

shape_the_sanguine_sacrament.Name: Shape the Sanguine Sacrament
shape_the_sanguine_sacrament.Effect: Shape blood into a shape or image.
shape_the_sanguine_sacrament.AdditionalNotes: If the user uses their vitae, it costs one Rouse Check.

a_taste_for_blood.Name: A Taste for Blood
a_taste_for_blood.Effect: Discover traits of another through their blood.

extinguish_vitae.Name: Extinguish Vitae
extinguish_vitae.Effect: In use, this increases another Kindred’s Hunger.
extinguish_vitae.AdditionalNotes: The victim can determine who used this power against them if they can see them and win an Intelligence + Occult vs Wits + Subterfuge roll.

blood_of_potency.Name: Blood of Potency
blood_of_potency.AdditionalNotes: This power can allow a Kindred to bypass the Blood Potency limit set by their generation.

scorpions_touch.Name: Scorpion’s Touch
scorpions_touch.Effect: Change own vitae into paralyzing poison.
scorpions_touch.AdditionalNotes: A mortal who takes any damage from this will go unconscious.

transitive_bond.Name: Transitive Bond
transitive_bond.Effect: Extend the properties of Blood Bonding in vitae.
transitive_bond.AdditionalNotes: This power was developed originally by the Tremere to combat their bane to only resurface within the Sabbat.

theft_of_vitae.Name: Theft of Vitae
theft_of_vitae.Effect: Manipulate blood from a victim through the air to feed.
theft_of_vitae.AdditionalNotes: When in use the victim is under the same influence as a standard Kiss.

baals_caress.Name: Baal’s Caress
baals_caress.Effect: Change the user's own Vitae into an aggressive and lethal poison.
baals_caress.AdditionalNotes: If a mortal takes one point of damage they die instantly.

cauldron_of_blood.Name: Cauldron of Blood
cauldron_of_blood.Effect: Boil the victim's blood in their body.
cauldron_of_blood.AdditionalNotes: If a mortal takes one point of damage they die screaming.

reclamation_of_vitae.Name: Reclamation of Vitae
reclamation_of_vitae.Effect: Reclaim the Blood given to create ghouls over distance.
reclamation_of_vitae.AdditionalNotes: Those outside of the Sabbat take stains upon use.

cats_grace.Name: Cat’s Grace
cats_grace.AdditionalNotes: Does not work on objects that cannot support their weight.

rapid_reflexes.Name: Rapid Reflexes
rapid_reflexes.AdditionalNotes: This power also prevents them from taking a penalty when they have no cover during a firefight.

fleetness.Name: Fleetness
fleetness.Effect: Add Celerity rating for non-combat Dexterity test or defending.
fleetness.AdditionalNotes: This may be used once per turn when defending with associated pools.

blink.Name: Blink
blink.Effect: Closes the distance as if teleporting.
blink.AdditionalNotes: The user moves in a straight line and may need to make checks against difficult terrain.

traversal.Name: Traversal
traversal.Effect: Move fast enough to move up vertical surfaces or liquid surfaces.
traversal.AdditionalNotes: The Storyteller should inform the user beforehand if the target is too far away

draught_of_elegance.Name: Draught of Elegance
draught_of_elegance.Duration: One Night; for drinkers until the vampire's next feeding or Hunger 5
draught_of_elegance.Effect: Turn their vitae into a Celerity boost for others
draught_of_elegance.AdditionalNotes: Each drinker must take one Rouse Checks worth.

unerring_aim.Name: Unerring Aim
unerring_aim.Effect: The world slows down to a crawl
unerring_aim.AdditionalNotes: Those with Celerity 5 may nullify this power with a Rouse Check and defend.

lightning_strike.Name: Lightning Strike
lightning_strike.AdditionalNotes: Those with Celerity 5 may nullify this power with a Rouse Check and defend.

split_second.Name: Split Second
split_second.Duration: One action, as determined by ST
split_second.Effect: Alter the events given by Storyteller in a current scene within reason
split_second.AdditionalNotes: The action should be reasonable and accomplished within a few seconds in real-time.

cloud_memory.Name: Cloud Memory
cloud_memory.Effect: Make someone forget the current moment.
cloud_memory.AdditionalNotes: No rolls are needed when the target is an unprepared mortal.

compel.Name: Compel
compel.AdditionalNotes: No rolls are needed when the target is an unprepared mortal. However, mortals who have been Dominated in this scene already or this goes against their nature may roll to resist.

mesmerize.Name: Mesmerize
mesmerize.Duration: Until command is carried out or the scene ends
mesmerize.AdditionalNotes: No rolls are needed when the target is an unprepared mortal. However, if this goes against their nature they may roll to resist.

dementation.Name: Dementation
dementation.Cost: One Rouse Check per target per Scene
dementation.AdditionalNotes: To use this power, the user must have had a conversation with them.

domitors_favor.Name: Domitor's Favor
domitors_favor.Effect: Make defiance while under a Blood Bond more difficult.
domitors_favor.AdditionalNotes: Total fail on defiance rolls means the bond does not weaken that month.

slavish_devotion.Name: Slavish Devotion
slavish_devotion.Effect: Those already underneath Dominate find it easier to resist other kindred's Dominate.
slavish_devotion.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 104

forgetful_mind.Name: Forgetful Mind
forgetful_mind.AdditionalNotes: Each point of margin on the test allows one additional memory to be altered.

submerged_directive.Name: Submerged Directive
submerged_directive.Effect: Implant Dominate orders as suggestions for victims.
submerged_directive.AdditionalNotes: These orders never expire until completed and targets can only have one at a time.

ancestral_dominion.Name: Ancestral Dominion
ancestral_dominion.Duration: One scene or when the directive is fulfilled
ancestral_dominion.Effect: Compel a descendant to act even if against their own opinion.
ancestral_dominion.AdditionalNotes: For each generation after the first separating them, the target gains an additional die to resist.
ancestral_dominion.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 104

rationalize.Name: Rationalize
rationalize.Effect: Convince victims of Dominate it was their idea the entire time.
rationalize.AdditionalNotes: If pressed on their actions the victim can make a test and if successful they question their actions.

tabula_rasa.Name: Tabula Rasa
tabula_rasa.Effect: Erase the victim's memory to the point they don't know who they are.
tabula_rasa.AdditionalNotes: Following this power's use is generally a string of lies and Path Indoctrination.

mass_manipulation.Name: Mass Manipulation
mass_manipulation.Cost: One Rouse Check in addition to power it's added to
mass_manipulation.Effect: Extend effects of Dominate to multiple targets.
mass_manipulation.AdditionalNotes: The victims need to see the eyes of the user. The user makes the roll against the strongest of the group.

terminal_decree.Name: Terminal Decree
terminal_decree.Effect: Bolster effects of Dominate to be able to circumvent victims' self-preservation.
terminal_decree.AdditionalNotes: Terminal commands are always resisted instead of auto failing.

resilience.Name: Resilience
resilience.Effect: Add their Fortitude rating to the health track.

unswayable_mind.Name: Unswayable Mind
unswayable_mind.Effect: Add Fortitude rating to rolls to resist methods to sway the character's mind against their will including supernatural.

enduring_beasts.Name: Enduring Beasts
enduring_beasts.Effect: Share the vampire's toughness with animals.
enduring_beasts.AdditionalNotes: If used on their Famulus, it is free and automatic without a roll required.

obdurate.Name: Obdurate
obdurate.Effect: Maintain footing when hit with a massive force.
obdurate.AdditionalNotes: Any superficial damage from falling or being hit is reduced by the Fortitude score, before being halved.

toughness.Name: Toughness
toughness.Effect: Subtract the Fortitude rating from all superficial damage taken before halving, it cannot be rounded down below one.
toughness.AdditionalNotes: This occurs before halving the damage but cannot reduce it below one.

valeren.Name: Valeren
valeren.AdditionalNotes: A subject can be affected by the power only once a night.

defy_bane.Name: Defy Bane
defy_bane.Effect: Convert Aggravated Damage to Superficial Damage.
defy_bane.AdditionalNotes: They may not heal the superficial damage for the rest of the scene.

fortify_the_inner_façade.Name: Fortify the Inner Façade
fortify_the_inner_façade.Effect: Increasing the Difficulty of mental powers to read or pierce the mind by half of the Fortitude Rating.
fortify_the_inner_façade.AdditionalNotes: If the rules allow them to resist, they add their Fortitude rating to their pool instead.

seal_the_beasts_maw.Name: Seal the Beast's Maw
seal_the_beasts_maw.Effect: A vampire can ignore the effects of hunger if they do not increase hunger from the two Rouse Checks, but reduce their dice pools.
seal_the_beasts_maw.AdditionalNotes: If a dice pool reduces to 0, a Fury Frenzy test is made.

draught_of_endurance.Name: Draught of Endurance
draught_of_endurance.Effect: Turn their vitae into a Fortitude boost for others.
draught_of_endurance.AdditionalNotes: Each drinker must take one Rouse Checks worth.

shatter.Name: Shatter
shatter.Effect: The opponent takes the damage which Toughness subtracts.
shatter.AdditionalNotes: Weapons will break if their modifier is met in damage received.
shatter.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 104

flesh_of_marble.Name: Flesh of Marble
flesh_of_marble.Effect: Ignore the first source of physical damage each turn unless sunlight.
flesh_of_marble.AdditionalNotes: A critical win on an attack bypasses this power.

prowess_from_pain.Name: Prowess from Pain
prowess_from_pain.Effect: No longer suffers penalty from Health damage and can increase one Attribute per level of damage on their tracker.
prowess_from_pain.AdditionalNotes: The Attributes may not exceed their Blood Surge value + 6.

cloak_of_shadows.Name: Cloak of Shadows
cloak_of_shadows.Effect: As long as the user stands still they blend into their surroundings.
cloak_of_shadows.AdditionalNotes: Follows the general rules for Obfuscate.

silence_of_death.Name: Silence of Death
silence_of_death.Effect: Nullifies the sounds a user makes.
silence_of_death.AdditionalNotes: This power does not eliminate powers made outside of the user's personal space.

chimerstry.Name: Chimerstry
chimerstry.AdditionalNotes: These hallucinations can never be recorded or sent through transmissions.

ghosts_passing.Name: Ghost's Passing
ghosts_passing.Effect: The user can bestow Obfuscate onto an animal.
ghosts_passing.AdditionalNotes: Sense the Unseen can discern signs as per general Obfuscate rules

unseen_passage.Name: Unseen Passage
unseen_passage.Effect: The user can now move while remaining hidden.
unseen_passage.AdditionalNotes: This power will fail if the user is being actively watched when activated.

ventriloquism.Name: Ventriloquism
ventriloquism.Effect: Throw their voice so only the intended recipient can hear it.
ventriloquism.AdditionalNotes: Can be used on anyone in line of sight.

fata_morgana.Name: Fata Morgana
fata_morgana.Duration: One scene, unless let to lapse
fata_morgana.AdditionalNotes: These hallucinations cannot cause damage or appear to affect the surrounding reality. They cannot blind or deafen through sensory overloading.

ghost_in_the_machine.Name: Ghost in the Machine
ghost_in_the_machine.Effect: Allows the effects of Obfuscate to be transmitted through technology when viewed on a live screen.
ghost_in_the_machine.AdditionalNotes: If viewed later the image seems blurred, making identification harder.

mask_of_a_thousand_faces.Name: Mask of a Thousand Faces
mask_of_a_thousand_faces.Effect: Make themselves appear as a mundane face rather than disappear allowing interaction and communication.
mask_of_a_thousand_faces.AdditionalNotes: This power allows them to interact and speak to others around them.

mask_of_isolation.Name: Mask of Isolation
mask_of_isolation.Duration: One night plus one additional night per margin of success
mask_of_isolation.Effect: Force Mask of a Thousand Faces onto a victim.
mask_of_isolation.AdditionalNotes: Should the user be made aware of the power being used on them the effects end.

mental_maze.Name: Mental Maze
mental_maze.Effect: Remove all sense of direction and location from a victim in a location.
mental_maze.AdditionalNotes: The resistance roll can only be made by the supernatural but cannot be teamworked.
mental_maze.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 85

conceal.Name: Conceal
conceal.Duration: One night plus one additional night per margin of success
conceal.AdditionalNotes: This power cannot affect anything larger than a two-story house or anything moving on it's own.

vanish.Name: Vanish
vanish.Effect: Activate Cloak of Shadows or Unseen Passage while being observed.
vanish.AdditionalNotes: This power makes the memory of the Kindred foggy and indistinct, but it will not affect the memories of vampires.

cloak_the_gathering.Name: Cloak the Gathering
cloak_the_gathering.Cost: One Rouse Check in additional to the cost of the power extended
cloak_the_gathering.AdditionalNotes: This power extends to a number of people equal to the user's Wits, plus additional Rouse Checks.

imposters_guise.Name: Imposter's Guise
imposters_guise.AdditionalNotes: The face they wish to copy must be studied for at least five minutes from multiple angles.

ashes_to_ashes.Name: Ashes to Ashes
ashes_to_ashes.Effect: Destroy a corpse by dissolving it.
ashes_to_ashes.AdditionalNotes: If the body is not animated it will dissolve throughout three turns with no test needed.
ashes_to_ashes.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 204

binding_fetter.Name: Binding Fetter
binding_fetter.Effect: Allow users to be able to identify a fetter by use of their senses.
binding_fetter.AdditionalNotes: During its use the user receives a -2 penalty to all Awareness, Wits, and Resolve rolls.
binding_fetter.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 204

oblivion_sight.Name: Oblivion Sight
oblivion_sight.Effect: See in darkness clearly and see ghosts present.
oblivion_sight.AdditionalNotes: This does not give the ability to make physical contact with ghosts.

shadow_cloak.Name: Shadow Cloak
shadow_cloak.Effect: +2 bonus to stealth rolls and intimidation against mortals.

arms_of_ahriman.Name: Arms of Ahriman
arms_of_ahriman.Duration: One scene or until ended or destroyed
arms_of_ahriman.Effect: Conjures shadow appendages that the user can control but the user is unable to do anything else.
arms_of_ahriman.AdditionalNotes: The shadow can be extended up to twice the user's Oblivion rating in yards/meters.

fatal_precognition.Name: Fatal Precognition
fatal_precognition.Duration: Until fulfilled, avoided or the story ends
fatal_precognition.AdditionalNotes: The vampire must be able to see or hear the target during the power's use.
fatal_precognition.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 204

shadow_cast.Name: Shadow Cast
shadow_cast.Effect: Conjure shadows from the user's body.
shadow_cast.AdditionalNotes: The shadow can be extended up to twice the user's Oblivion rating in yards/meters. Those standing in the shadow take more Willpower damage from social conflict

where_the_shroud_thins.Name: Where the Shroud Thins
where_the_shroud_thins.Effect: Determine the density of the Shroud in their area.
where_the_shroud_thins.AdditionalNotes: The book lists a chart stating the possible different densities and causes, as well as their effects.
where_the_shroud_thins.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 205

aura_of_decay.Name: Aura of Decay
aura_of_decay.Effect: Harnessing their connection to Oblivion can make plants wilt, animals and humans sick, and food spoil.
aura_of_decay.AdditionalNotes: Repeated use of this power within the same scene does not affect Mortals already damaged by it.
aura_of_decay.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 205

passion_feast.Name: Passion Feast
passion_feast.Effect: Allows a vampire to slake Hunger on the passion of wraiths.
passion_feast.AdditionalNotes: Feeding from wraiths may merit a Stain at the Storytellers discretion.
passion_feast.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 206

shadow_perspective.Name: Shadow Perspective
shadow_perspective.Effect: Projects their senses into a shadow within line of sight.
shadow_perspective.AdditionalNotes: The use of this power is undetectable in the shadow other than by supernatural means such as Sense the Unseen.

touch_of_oblivion.Name: Touch of Oblivion
touch_of_oblivion.Effect: Wither's a body part on touch.
touch_of_oblivion.AdditionalNotes: If the victim is attempting to avoid the vampire it may require a contested Strength + Brawl roll.

necrotic_plague.Name: Necrotic Plague
necrotic_plague.Duration: One turn to activate, variable length of the condition
necrotic_plague.AdditionalNotes: This illness cannot be treated in a medical setting as it's supernaturally inflicted, instead only healed by drinking vitae.
necrotic_plague.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 206

stygian_shroud.Name: Stygian Shroud
stygian_shroud.Effect: Darkness spews out of a nearby shadow and covers the area.
stygian_shroud.AdditionalNotes: The shadow can be extended up to twice the user's Oblivion rating in yards/meters.

umbrous_clutch.Name: Umbrous Clutch
umbrous_clutch.Effect: Using the victim's shadow they create a portal, dropping them into the user's arms.
umbrous_clutch.AdditionalNotes: An unprepared mortal will be terrified while a vampire must test for fury or fear Frenzy test at a Difficulty 4.

shadow_step.Name: Shadow Step
shadow_step.Effect: The user can step into one shadow and appear in another within their sight.
shadow_step.AdditionalNotes: A willing person may be taken through the Shadow Step but should the user stain, so does the passenger.

skuld_fulfilled.Name: Skuld Fulfilled
skuld_fulfilled.Duration: Variable, depending on if the condition is treatable
skuld_fulfilled.Effect: Reintroduce illnesses someone has recovered from.
skuld_fulfilled.AdditionalNotes: If the victim is a ghoul their immunity to aging is removed and eliminates any vitae in their system.
skuld_fulfilled.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 207

tenebrous_avatar.Name: Tenebrous Avatar
tenebrous_avatar.Effect: Changes their body into a shadow able to move over any surface or through small spaces.
tenebrous_avatar.AdditionalNotes: The user takes no damage except sunlight and fire while in this form.

withering_spirit.Name: Withering Spirit
withering_spirit.Effect: Erode a victim's spirit till they are a husk.
withering_spirit.AdditionalNotes: If the target is Impaired, they will not return as a wraith.
withering_spirit.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 208

lethal_body.Name: Lethal Body
lethal_body.Effect: Unarmed attacks do Aggravated Health damage to mortals when used and ignore one level of armor per Potence rating of user.

soaring_leap.Name: Soaring Leap
soaring_leap.Effect: Leap higher and further than usual.
soaring_leap.AdditionalNotes: They can move as many meters as three times their Potence rating.

prowess.Name: Prowess
prowess.Effect: Add Potence rating to their unarmed damage and to feats of Strength, add half their Potence rating (Rounded up) to Melee damage.

brutal_feed.Name: Brutal Feed
brutal_feed.Effect: Turn feeding into a violent and messy affair that only lasts seconds to Slake the user's Hunger.
brutal_feed.AdditionalNotes: Against vampires the number of feeding actions is halved (rounded down).

spark_of_rage.Name: Spark of Rage
spark_of_rage.Effect: The user can add their Potence rating to rile or incite a person or crowd to violent actions.
spark_of_rage.AdditionalNotes: Against vampires, the user will roll Manipulation + Potence vs Intelligence + Composure.

uncanny_grip.Name: Uncanny Grip
uncanny_grip.Effect: Strengthens their grip on most surfaces, allowing them to climb or hang unsupported.
uncanny_grip.AdditionalNotes: The use of this power leaves obvious traces from the damage caused.

draught_of_might.Name: Draught of Might
draught_of_might.Effect: Turn their vitae into a Potence boost for others.
draught_of_might.AdditionalNotes: Each drinker must take one Rouse Checks worth.

earth_shock.Name: Earth Shock
earth_shock.Effect: Create a shockwave to throw opponents prone.
earth_shock.AdditionalNotes: This can only be used once per scene.

fist_of_caine.Name: Fist of Caine
fist_of_caine.Effect: Inflict Aggravated Health damage to mortals and supernatural creatures alike.

awe.Name: Awe
awe.Duration: One scene or until ended by the user
awe.Effect: Add Presence rating to any Skill roll involving Persuasion, Performance, or Charisma related rolls as per ST discretion.
awe.AdditionalNotes: Once the power wears off the victim reverts to their original opinions.

daunt.Name: Daunt
daunt.Duration: One scene or until ended by the user
daunt.Effect: Add Presence rating to any intimidation rolls.
daunt.AdditionalNotes: Awe and Daunt cannot be used at the same time.

eyes_of_the_serpent.Name: Eyes of the Serpent
eyes_of_the_serpent.Duration: Until eye contact is broken or the scene ends
eyes_of_the_serpent.Effect: Immobilize a victim by making eye contact.
eyes_of_the_serpent.AdditionalNotes: A vampire victim can break this by spending Willpower any turn after the first.

lingering_kiss.Name: Lingering Kiss
lingering_kiss.Duration: Number of nights equal to the user's Presence rating
lingering_kiss.Effect: Usable during feedings, the victim gains a bonus to Social attribute for one night.
lingering_kiss.AdditionalNotes: A withdrawal follows where the victim takes a penalty equal to the original bonus when not actively working towards the next fix. It cannot be used on those under a Blood Bond. Unbondable cannot take this discipline power. [Errata]

clear_the_field.Name: Clear the Field
clear_the_field.Effect: Clear a space in a calm and orderly manner.

dread_gaze.Name: Dread Gaze
dread_gaze.Effect: Instill fear into a target to make them flee.
dread_gaze.AdditionalNotes: A critical win against a vampire victim means the victim makes a terror Frenzy at difficulty 3.

entrancement.Name: Entrancement
entrancement.Duration: One hour plus one per point of margin
entrancement.Effect: Influence someone into a star-struck or beguiled state of mind where they do their best to keep the user happy. Adding their Presence rating in dice to any social rolls against the victim.
entrancement.AdditionalNotes: If the request is harmful to the victim or their loved ones, or opposes their tenets the test must be made again or Entrancement fails.

true_loves_face.Name: True Love's Face
true_loves_face.Effect: The victim will perceive the user as a mortal they have strong emotional ties with, be it hatred or love.
true_loves_face.AdditionalNotes: Can net stains for the victim if the perceived target is their touchstone.
true_loves_face.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 85

irresistible_voice.Name: Irresistible Voice
irresistible_voice.Effect: The user's voice alone is enough to use Dominate on a target.

magnum_opus.Name: Magnum Opus
magnum_opus.AdditionalNotes: Audiences must roll Composure + Resolve to resist its effects.

summon.Name: Summon
summon.Effect: Call someone to them who has had certain Presence powers used on them or tasted the user's vitae.
summon.AdditionalNotes: The victim will not physically or financially harm themselves to reach the user.

majesty.Name: Majesty
majesty.Effect: Everyone who looks at the user is dumbstruck unable to act in any way other than self-preservation.
majesty.AdditionalNotes: A win on the contested roll allows one turn plus one per margin of freedom.

star_magnetism.Name: Star Magnetism
star_magnetism.Effect: Allows the use of presence through live-feed technology, does not work on recorded content.
star_magnetism.AdditionalNotes: If using Entrancement the user must speak the targets name clearly.

eyes_of_the_beast.Name: Eyes of the Beast
eyes_of_the_beast.Effect: Allows the user to see in total darkness.
eyes_of_the_beast.AdditionalNotes: +2 bonus dice to intimidation against mortals when active.

weight_of_the_feather.Name: Weight of the Feather
weight_of_the_feather.Effect: The user can make themselves almost weightless.
weight_of_the_feather.AdditionalNotes: Wits + Survival is only used when activated as a reaction.

feral_weapons.Name: Feral Weapons
feral_weapons.Effect: Elongate the user's nails into claws, gaining a +2 modifier to damage or elongate their fangs and not suffer a called shot penalty.
feral_weapons.AdditionalNotes: Superficial damage inflicted by the user is not halved while active.

vicissitude.Name: Vicissitude
vicissitude.Effect: Sculpt the flesh of bodies allowing changes to their own bodies.
vicissitude.AdditionalNotes: Each success on the roll allows a single change to be made.

earth_meld.Name: Earth Meld
earth_meld.Duration: One day or more, or until disturbed
earth_meld.Effect: Sink into the earth and become one with the soil.
earth_meld.AdditionalNotes: This power only works on natural surfaces and not artificial such as concrete.

fleshcrafting.Name: Fleshcrafting
fleshcrafting.Effect: Extends the mastery over the flesh to be used on others.
fleshcrafting.AdditionalNotes: An unwilling subject may resist with the margin of the user's role counting as the number of changes able to be made.

shapechange.Name: Shapechange
shapechange.Effect: Change into an animal with a similar body mass.
shapechange.AdditionalNotes: Users gain the Physical Attributes and other traits of the animal they've changed into.

visceral_absorption.Name: Visceral Absorption
visceral_absorption.Effect: Draw in the remains of blood and body to the vampire to clean a scene.
visceral_absorption.AdditionalNotes: Hunger can be reduced by one per body, up to the level of their Blood Sorcery rating but cannot reduce to 0.

horrid_form.Name: Horrid Form
horrid_form.AdditionalNotes: Grants several changes equal to the user's Protean rating. Any critical scores are counted as messy criticals and Frenzy checks are made with +2 Difficulty.

metamorphosis.Name: Metamorphosis
metamorphosis.Effect: Extends shape change to be able to change into a larger animal than the vampire's mass.

the_heart_of_darkness.Name: The Heart of Darkness
the_heart_of_darkness.Duration: Permanent or until the heart is destroyed or returned to the host's body
the_heart_of_darkness.Effect: Allows a vampire to remove their own heart and store it outside of their body.
the_heart_of_darkness.AdditionalNotes: If the heart is dealt aggravated damage equal to or greater than the user's health tracker, they fall into torpor. It can only be destroyed through fire or sunlight.
the_heart_of_darkness.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 85

mist_form.Name: Mist Form
mist_form.Effect: Turn into a cloud of mist.
mist_form.AdditionalNotes: This power takes three turns to use and may be sped up with additional Rouse Checks on a one-for-one trade.

one_with_the_land.Name: One with the Land
one_with_the_land.Duration: One day or more, or until physically disturbed
one_with_the_land.Effect: Sink into the earth of their Domain.
one_with_the_land.AdditionalNotes: Same system as Earth Meld however they are not limited by the material.

the_unfettered_heart.Name: The Unfettered Heart
the_unfettered_heart.Effect: The heart of the vampire can move freely within the chest, making staking more difficult.
the_unfettered_heart.AdditionalNotes: Only upon a critical win does the stake penetrate when in melee combat.

far_reach.Name: Far Reach
far_reach.Effect: Push, pull, hold or grab objects or people with their mind.
far_reach.AdditionalNotes: Keeping something held in the air requires a check each turn of Resolve + Alchemy Difficulty 3.

gaolers_bane.Name: Gaoler's Bane
gaolers_bane.Duration: One Scene or until ended voluntarily
gaolers_bane.Effect: Receive a 2-dice bonus when freeing themselves from physical restraints or grapples.

haze.Name: Haze
haze.Duration: One Scene or until ended voluntarily
haze.Effect: Create a mist that follows the user, making it harder to shoot them or identify them.
haze.AdditionalNotes: This can be extended to encompass up to five people with an additional Rouse Check.

portable_shade.Name: Portable Shade
portable_shade.Duration: Hours active are equal to the Stamina + Alchemy test or the next sunset, whichever is first
portable_shade.Effect: Withstand the effects of Sunlight and walk in the sun.
portable_shade.AdditionalNotes: This formula was developed by the Path of the Sun Thin-bloods.

blood_of_mandagloire.Name: Blood of Mandagloire
blood_of_mandagloire.Duration: Remains active in the herd's blood for three nights
blood_of_mandagloire.Effect: Infect the blood of a herd to cause those who feed from it to fall into a dreamless sleep.
blood_of_mandagloire.AdditionalNotes: Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Second Inquisition.

envelop.Name: Envelop
envelop.Duration: One Scene or until ended voluntarily
envelop.Effect: Create a mist that clings to a victim.
envelop.AdditionalNotes: This can only be employed on single targets one at a time.

mirror_of_trust.Name: Mirror of Trust
mirror_of_trust.Effect: Gain 3 extra dice to persuade or intimidate someone into being honest.
mirror_of_trust.AdditionalNotes: Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Second Inquisition.

reds_flaming_hot_sauce.Name: Red's Flaming Hot Sauce
reds_flaming_hot_sauce.Duration: Until used, the fire lasts one scene or longer based on the surroundings
reds_flaming_hot_sauce.AdditionalNotes: Fire spreading from it can be extinguished, but the supernatural source cannot.

counterfeit_discipline.Name: Counterfeit Discipline
counterfeit_discipline.Cost: The same as the power channeled
counterfeit_discipline.Duration: The same as the power channeled
counterfeit_discipline.DicePool: The same as the power channeled
counterfeit_discipline.OpposingPool: The same as the power channeled
counterfeit_discipline.AdditionalNotes: Requires a drop of vitae from a vampire of a matching clan or who possesses the Discipline.

chemicallyinduced_flashback.Name: Chemically-Induced Flashback
chemicallyinduced_flashback.Cost: One Rouse Check in addition to the use of Ashe
chemicallyinduced_flashback.Effect: Imbue and experience a Memorium of another vampire.
chemicallyinduced_flashback.AdditionalNotes: Must use the Fixatio method. The Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Ashfinders.
chemicallyinduced_flashback.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 45

concoct_ashe.Name: Concoct Ashe
concoct_ashe.Effect: Create Ashe from the remains of a vampire.
concoct_ashe.AdditionalNotes: Must use the Fixatio method. The Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Ashfinders.
concoct_ashe.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 45

defractionate.Name: Defractionate
defractionate.Effect: Turn preserved blood into something palatable by any kindred.
defractionate.AdditionalNotes: Each Distillation style has a unique method of tapping for this elixir.

fangstinger.Name: Fang-Stinger
fangstinger.Effect: Introduce blood into a mortal that causes no harm to them but harms vampire's that feed from them.
fangstinger.AdditionalNotes: Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Second Inquisition.

freezer_fluid.Name: Freezer Fluid
freezer_fluid.AdditionalNotes: Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Second Inquisition.

ondemand_sunburn.Name: On-Demand Sunburn
ondemand_sunburn.Duration: Until unleashed or next sunset, whichever is first
ondemand_sunburn.Effect: Become a sun battery and harm vampires they touch.
ondemand_sunburn.AdditionalNotes: This formula was developed by the Path of the Sun Thin-bloods.

profane_hieros_gamos.Name: Profane Hieros Gamos
profane_hieros_gamos.Cost: One Rouse Check or One point of Aggravated Damage for mortals
profane_hieros_gamos.Effect: Change their form into their ideal human shape.
profane_hieros_gamos.AdditionalNotes: This cannot spare the Nosferatu from their bane. [Errata]

stay_the_falling_sand.Name: Stay the Falling Sand
stay_the_falling_sand.Duration: One round or more if maintained, expires after one use
stay_the_falling_sand.AdditionalNotes: Cannot be used on living creatures or kindred.

airborne_momentum.Name: Airborne Momentum
airborne_momentum.AdditionalNotes: Can move at running speed and carrying a human-sized mass slows to walking speed. This can only be used by the alchemist.

discipline_channeling.Name: Discipline Channeling
discipline_channeling.Cost: The same as the power channeled
discipline_channeling.AdditionalNotes: Must use the Fixatio method. The Thin-bloods develop this formula within the Ashfinders.
discipline_channeling.Source: Cults of the Blood Gods, page 46

hollow_leg.Name: Hollow Leg
hollow_leg.Duration: One night or until the victim suffers a hunger Frenzy
hollow_leg.Effect: Poison another Kindred so that they are unable to slake hunger.
hollow_leg.AdditionalNotes: The victim must be tricked, coerced or forced into drinking this.

awaken_the_sleeper.Name: Awaken the Sleeper
awaken_the_sleeper.AdditionalNotes: Each Distillation style has a unique method of tapping for this elixir.
